topPrompts: In this task, you will see images briefly flashed on the screen. Your job is to count the images in a “target” category and ignore the others. At the end, we will ask you how many target images you saw.
bottomPrompts: In this run, please count all the faces with hats. (Press ENTER to continue.)

topPrompts: Here are some examples of faces with hats (left) and no hats (right).
bottomPrompts: Just before and after each image, there will be a cross in the middle of the screen. Please look directly at the cross and try not to blink during this period. (Press ENTER to continue.)
